Details:- My taluk property, that is, my heavenly home. On 17-02-2009, I, Subbaiah Garu's son, Sitaramayya, etc., have received the sale price and have been tested in the 1st book of Piduguralla S.R.O. No. 670/2009. The vacant land as per the schedule below, which I have the right to possess, is sold to you for the needs of my family at my own will for Rs. 2,42,000/-. The purchase price of Rs. 2,42,000/- has been paid to me in cash today and I have received the full purchase price. This purchase price has been transferred to you today. From this day on, if you or your heirs freely enjoy this property with all rights of donation, sale, and possession, then I or my father, you or your heirs, for ever, D. Ramalho261

1. This property is not assigned to the assignee.
2. This property is not owned by the Government of Africa. It does not belong to any of its affiliated companies. It is not a property on which the above companies have been given securities.
3. The property transferred by this deed does not include any buildings, mango, coconut trees or plantations or any valuable minerals, granite or other stone mines, machinery, fish ponds or any other property. If any facts have been concealed herein, we are entitled to take action under sections 27 and 64 of the Indian Stamp Act and to prosecute, pay depreciation duty I hereby confirm that the survey number, door number, measurements and all the particulars given in this document are true and correct. In case of any discrepancy, the Government of India shall be liable to pay a penalty of three times the actual stamp duty as per section 41K(a) of the Indian Stamp Act, 1888, as amended by section 70(2) of the Indian Stamp (Andhra Pradesh Amendment) Act No. 16/2002. I hereby certify that I have duly obtained the stamp duty payable on the document in accordance with section 27 of the Indian Stamp Act, 1888, in respect of which I have duly obtained the full facts relating to the stamp duty, the consideration for the purchase and the market value of the property. We hereby declare that we have been informed and that if we do not proceed as mentioned in section 27 above, we will be liable to be prosecuted under section 70 to recover the amount of stamp duty and fine under section 64, 64A. We hereby declare that we have entered in the deed all the particulars necessary to identify the property, including the boundaries, door number, full address etc. along with a plan, in accordance with section 21 of the Indian Registration Act, 1608. I hereby certify under section 22(b) of the Indian Stamp Act that the property has not been acquired by me/us or by my/our agents/ We hereby certify that the above matters have been read out in full in the presence of the following witnesses. We hereby confirm that all the above matters have been recorded by us and that the Registrar has recorded all the above as stated by us. 15301--/-, Registration The stamp duty on this document is Rs. 2422/- and user charges are Rs. 120% 12/- and Rs. 183.32/- deposited in the State Bank of India on 12.3.32/- and the said receipt is filed with this document. This declaration is to inform that at the time of preparation of this document
the details of the properties in the document, copies of the land deeds, taluk pattadar passbooks, adangulas, link documents, tax receipts for the places/houses, details of the parties in the link documents, addresses of the parties and photographs of the parties. We have brought all the necessary documents like property register etc. and have thoroughly examined all the aspects and have included them in this document and have prepared the document. No matter what should be written or included, we have left out in this document. The schedule property has been physically examined and measured and the document has been drawn up. We are fully responsible for the stamp duty and all other matters found in the future during the inspection of the property in the said document by the authorities (Registration & Stamp Duty). Neither the Sub-Registrar nor the writer of the document has any connection with this. If it is found in the future that the property sold is not owned by the Government, Endowment, Pax Board and Assignee, then they will be held responsible for their actions. We are the ones who are responsible for everything, this declaration is written by us after reading this document completely and with our full consent, this is the truth. Dated.17-01

reportJson.propertyExtent: 121.22 Sq. Yds. (As per Deed 193.6 Sq.Yds. - Partial Sale 72.38 Sq.  Yds.)

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No 261 of 2019 dated 17/Jan/2019, executed by Dhulipalla Ramakrishna in favour of Shaik Banda Habibunnisa, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 121.22 Sq. Yds. (As per Deed 193.6 Sq.Yds. - Partial Sale 72.38 Sq. Yds.) located near by house no.18-624, comprised in survey number 566/1, situated in Piduguralla Municipality, Yerukula colony, erstwhile Guntur District, now within the District of Palnadu, registered at Sub-Registrar Office, Piduguralla(727) is bounded as follows: North by: 76.6 FT Donka South by: 75.6 FT Extent Remaining Site East by: 22.3 FT 20 Links Width Bazar West by: 23.9 FT 30 Links Bazar
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:: 1. It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible. 2. It is to be noted that as per EC Shaik Banda Habibunnisa Partially executed Sale deed vide Doc.No. 261 of 2019 in favour of Syed Jameela measuring an extent of 72.38 Sq. Yds., Hence F.I. has to verify the same and obtain valuation certificate for the retained extent 121.22 Sq. Yds., with updated boundaries proceed as per internal policy.
